page.title: 20Message
page.content:
It has been hard work, as there are so few of us, but we have enjoyed doing this project and have learnt a lot. We send our best wishes to everyone down the ages, for God's peace and prosperity - no more violence, riots, strikes, hijacks, pollution, famine...
Love and greetings from -
{Molly Burrows, Sarah Porter, Emma Todd { }age 10. {Jodie Anderson, Ruth Wilkinson, David { May,} age 9. {Sarah Porter,}age 8. {Jayne Button, Claire Devereux, Michael { Hateley, }age 7. {Mr Finch,}isn't certain about his age but says he feels 99 - has been here 20 years and lost most of his hair (as a result, no doubt). Hope to meet all readers in Paradise.
